reviews.customers_say: Customers find the coat chic and versatile, making outfits more dressy, and appreciate that it's nicer than a jacket or sweatshirt, with enough room for a sweater underneath. The coat receives positive feedback for its weight, comfort, and color, and customers consider it good value for money. The fabric quality receives mixed reviews, with some praising it while others find it cheap.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended
items.body: Warm and stylish. Worth purchasing. Ordering again. Read more
items.author: Xt**

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this coatâ€¦ but
items.body: First, I am 5â€™4â€, approx 140 lbs Pros: Classic style Large zippered pockets, but do not stand out or fall away from coat! Built into seam. Great for traveling. Love the fabric, soft and almost like felt wool Love the color (beige) Excellent, excellent customer service Cons: Coat came very wrinkled. Needed to steam it. Too large, which isnâ€™t necessarily a bad thing, but I am usually a large due to broad shoulders. Sleeves too long also and felt I couldâ€™ve gone to a medium. Also, if I were to keep it, I may shorten it and stitch the front facing which is loose and may flop out. So with all that, I am going to order a medium and I will update if it works. Again, this company went out of their way to get me the coat I wanted. Excellent communication!! Read more
items.author: NMK3

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish light weight cardigan coat
items.body: This is the perfect addition to your wardrobe. I am 5'5" and 135lbs, and I ordered the Navy cardigan coat in a small. It has a wool-like look but is stiff enough to resemble a coat and falls at mid-thigh for me. It is elegant enough to wear over a dress and heels, or you can add this edgy piece to your favorite chic outfit for a casual look. This coat doesn't have buttons leaving the front open just enough to get a peek at your outfit. There are also zippered pockets on the side to hold your favorite lipstick. It's a great piece to have, and you're sure to get noticed. Read more
items.author: FitGirl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars SUPER WRINKLED
items.body: This is a nice lapel. I wonâ€™t say that it isnâ€™t despite my following review, since I still have a small hope it will work out. Love the color. What I donâ€™t appreciate is how thin it is (I think it should be thicker) and itâ€™s not lined. It doesnâ€™t look as nice as in the picture. I donâ€™t want to say it looks cheap but it does not look expensive either. Itâ€™s not worth the high price. I would not have said anything about the above except I was awfully disappointed in how horribly wrinkled it was. I took it out of the bag and my gosh! It was just so bad! I had to purchase a steamer just to de-wrinkle it and while it had a little paper disclosing that due to vaccumm packing it was wrinkled and that it was â€œeasyâ€ to iron it - I wonder what kind of miracle iron you have to have in order to get rid of the huge wrinkles. 2 bottles of water and 1.5 hours later, I gave up. I left it as ironed as I could and hoped the person it was intended for did not think ill of me for gifting this thing to her. You really need to take it to the cleaners to get it professionally pressed and even then Iâ€™m not sure. It did look pretty on the advertisement though and I had high hopes. Iâ€™m not going to be buying it again and Iâ€™m waiting for my friend to ask for the gift receipt to have it exchanged (I didnâ€™t have time to get anything else so I still gifted it butâ€¦) Read more
items.author: Kleidy Hernandez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and warm
items.author: Monica Alvarado

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute look but don't buy
items.body: i bought this coat back awhile ago and have only wore it 3 times and it was never washed and im now looking at it planning on wearing it tonight and the liner is completely ripped in many places, how is that possible by wearing it a few times and not ever washing it. cute look to the coat but very poorly made!!!!!! Read more
items.author: Shannon Kay Gauden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy on a lovely coat.
items.body: Such a nice coat for the money! Iâ€™m thinking about ordering it on another color. The arms were generously sized, the fabric is so soft and thick. It arrived on time. A really nice coat for church or work. Read more
items.author: L.W.B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less expensive solution to the mid-spring outing - Strongly Recommended
items.body: I was looking for something light but warm enough that can be worn both dress up and dress down. The title for this clothes is "cardigan" but because of the design, and it is made with the material that is like thick felt, this is perfect for my need. When it arrived, I fell in love with it right away and have been wearing it all the time since then. It looks more expensive than the price. Material may be thinner than it looks in the pictures, which I expected it to be from other reviews. One of the promotional videos had polyester lining but the design I got does not have any lining. The inside of the material is like jersey and smooth, so, it does not bother my skin. Mind if you want it to stay looking new, though, you will need lint cleaner as it will create fuzzy balls (lint) after wearing it a season. Zippers for the pockets are cheaper kind so they don't move as smoothly as I want them to but it is not a deal killer. 5'3 and 126lbs: Small fits perfectly with a thin seater. Read more
items.author: thatsBS

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 2358black, Khaki, Beige, 2358beige, 2358khaki, 2489red, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Light Grey, 2358brown, 2489black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
